featured.text: Almost everything, from food to machinery, comes by way of the sea in huge ships piloted by captains.

definition.zh_def: 機械裝置或設備的總稱，通常用於工業或製造過程中。
definition.en_def: The collective term for machines or devices, typically used in industrial or manufacturing processes.
definition.example: The factory invested in new machinery to increase production efficiency.
